title: Client will not open
body: I updated to the new client yesterday and it worked fine until the logo switched today. I pressed the new logo to open League but nothing appears or opens. pls help riot!! Also, im running on a mac on osx sierra

replies.body: My league is still not opening.

This could be happening with the new client if it had crashed and lingering in the background.  A PC restart should fix this, but I also suggest going over teh steps of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case a setting is preventing it from launching.  Hope that helps!
